title: Which Charity Should CLU Donate To For The Month Of October?
body:
This proposal will decide who CluCoin will donate a portion of the Charity Wallet to for the month of October.

The following charities represent CluCoin's core values and also willingly accept crypto to support their efforts thus making the process easier and faster for everybody!

For more information on the charities see: https://clucoin.com/charity

Voting Ends September 30th, 2021 - 12:00 PM UTC
author: 0x44f6498D1403321890F3f2917E00F22dBDE3577a
